title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user with valid credentials can successfully log in and access the system with the appropriate role-based access.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password
Submit login form
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard
Verify user role permissions are applied correctly

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that a user with invalid credentials is denied access and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username or password
Submit login form
Verify login fails
Verify appropriate error message is displayed

title: Dashboard KPI Display Accuracy
description: Ensure all KPIs (productivity bonus, percentage achievement, total loads, orders, tonnage, volume, pallets estimation, average handling time) are accurately calculated and displayed with correct data.

steps.description: Log in as user with dashboard access
Navigate to the Dashboard page
Verify each KPI value is displayed
Verify KPI values match expected calculations from backend data

title: Dashboard Filters Functionality
description: Verify that filter parameters for time range and operational parameters update the KPIs and charts accurately and dynamically.

steps.description: Access the Dashboard
Apply different time filters (day, week, month, custom range)
Apply operational parameter filters (e.g., branch, employee)
Verify charts and KPIs update to reflect filtered data
Verify data shown is consistent with filter selections

title: Excel Upload: Valid File Preview and Validation
description: Verify the system correctly previews and validates a well-formed Excel (.xlsx) file before persistence, including automatic column detection and validation of required data.

steps.description: Navigate to Excel upload page
Upload a valid Excel file with correct columns and data
Verify the file content is previewed correctly
Verify automatic column detection maps columns properly
Verify validation checks pass with no errors

title: Excel Upload: Handle Invalid Data and Show Errors
description: Ensure invalid Excel file data triggers appropriate validation errors and prevents persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to Excel upload page
Upload an Excel file with missing required fields and invalid data types
Verify validation catches errors and displays clear messages
Verify upload does not persist invalid data

title: Excel Upload: Duplicate Data Prevention
description: Verify the system prevents persistence of duplicate records during Excel import and notifies the user accordingly.

steps.description: Upload an Excel file with records that duplicate existing database entries
Verify duplicate detection logic identifies duplicates
Verify system prevents duplicate entries from being saved
Verify user receives appropriate feedback about duplicates

title: Productivity Management: Assign Employee to Load
description: Ensure users can assign an employee to a load record and the assignment persists without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to productivity management page
Select a load record
Assign a valid employee from the dropdown
Save the changes
Verify assignment is saved and visible on the UI and backend

title: Productivity Management: Inline Editing and Calculation
description: Validate inline editing of time tracking, error logging, and notes updates the productivity record correctly and triggers recalculation of productivity metrics.

steps.description: Open productivity record inline editor
Modify operational data fields such as handling time and errors
Save changes
Verify changes persist
Verify productivity bonus and related metrics recalculate correctly

title: Discount Rule Application: Absence Discount
description: Verify the system automatically applies discounts based on recorded absences and reflects the impact on monthly bonus calculation.

steps.description: Create a discount record for absence for an employee
Trigger or view monthly bonus calculation
Verify the absence discount is applied correctly to the bonus amount

title: Discount Rule Application: Warning and Suspension Discounts
description: Ensure warnings and suspensions trigger the correct discount rules impacting the employee bonus as per business logic.

steps.description: Add a warning discount record to an employee
Verify warning discount affects bonus as per rules
Add a suspension discount record
Verify suspension discount is applied correctly on bonus

title: Base System Employee Management: CRUD Operations
description: Verify that administrators can create, read, update, and delete employee records through the management interface and changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to employee management panel
Create a new employee record with valid data
Verify the new employee appears in the list
Update the employee's information
Verify updates persist
Delete the employee record
Verify employee record is removed

title: Base System Branch Management: Bulk Import and Export
description: Check that branch records can be imported and exported correctly through Excel files, ensuring data integrity and format correctness.

steps.description: Export existing branch data to Excel
Verify the exported Excel contains correct and complete branch information
Modify Excel file for import with valid branch data
Import modified Excel of branches
Verify branch data updates persist and reflect on UI

title: Report Generation: Export Operation Performance Report
description: Ensure user can generate and export operational performance reports with selected filters, and exported data matches applied criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to report generation module
Select date range and operational filters
Generate the report
Export report in supported format
Verify exported report data matches selected filters and UI data

title: Report Generation: Validation on Missing Required Filters
description: Verify the system enforces selection of required filters before allowing report generation and exports, showing clear error messages if filters are missing.

steps.description: Navigate to report generation page
Attempt to generate report without selecting required filters
Verify system blocks report generation
Verify clear error message is presented
